member.name: T:Cake.SqlServer.BackupAliases
member.summary: Contains functionality to backup and restore SQL Server database

member.name: M:Cake.SqlServer.BackupAliases.RestoreSqlBackup(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,System.String,Cake.Core.IO.FilePath,Cake.SqlServer.RestoreSqlBackupSettings)
member.summary: Restores a database from a backup file.
member.param: The connection string. You may want to connect to master database for this operation.

member.name: M:Cake.SqlServer.BackupAliases.RestoreSqlBackup(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,System.String,Cake.Core.IO.FilePath)
member.summary: Restores a database from a backup file.
member.param: The connection string. You may want to connect to master database for this operation.

member.name: M:Cake.SqlServer.BackupAliases.BackupDatabase(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,System.String,System.String,Cake.SqlServer.BackupDatabaseSettings)
member.summary: Backup an existing database to a file.
member.param: The connection string. Regardless of the database specified, the connection will switch to master database for this operation.

member.name: T:Cake.SqlServer.BackupDatabaseSettings
member.summary: Settings for backing up database to a file

member.name: M:Cake.SqlServer.BackupDatabaseSettings.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor. Sets Compress to true.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.BackupDatabaseSettings.Path
member.summary: Gets or sets the backup file path. This can either be a file or a folder

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.BackupDatabaseSettings.Compress
member.summary: Sets the flag to execute backup and create a compressed file

member.name: T:Cake.SqlServer.CreateDatabaseSettings
member.summary: Settings object for creation of databases See spec from https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/sql/t-sql/statements/create-database-sql-server-transact-sql#the-model-database-and-creating-new-databases

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.CreateDatabaseSettings.PrimaryFile
member.summary: File Spec for Primary database file.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.CreateDatabaseSettings.LogFile
member.summary: File Spec for transaction log file

member.name: M:Cake.SqlServer.CreateDatabaseSettings.WithPrimaryFile(System.String)
member.summary: Builder method to set up path for primary file.

member.name: M:Cake.SqlServer.CreateDatabaseSettings.WithLogFile(System.String)
member.summary: Builder method to set up path to log file.

member.name: T:Cake.SqlServer.CreateDatabaseFileSpec
member.summary: File Spec object to describe file name and path for creating databases

member.name: M:Cake.SqlServer.CreateDatabaseFileSpec.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Constructor for filespec.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.CreateDatabaseFileSpec.FileName
member.summary: Path to file

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.CreateDatabaseFileSpec.Name
member.summary: Name of file - internal name of file in SQL Server. Defaulted to database name for mdf and {DatabaseName}_log for log files

member.name: T:Cake.SqlServer.DacAliases
member.summary: Contains functionality to deal with DAC functionality from SQL Server: create and restore BACPAC files; create and restore DACPAC files

member.name: M:Cake.SqlServer.DacAliases.CreateBacpacFile(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,System.String,System.String,Cake.Core.IO.FilePath)
member.summary: Creates a bacpac file for easy database backuping.
member.param: The connection string. You may want to connect to master database for this operation.
Name of the database you'd like to create a bacpac from
Full path where you'd like to store resulting bacpac

member.name: M:Cake.SqlServer.DacAliases.RestoreBacpac(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,System.String,System.String,Cake.Core.IO.FilePath)
member.summary:
Restores a bacpac file into a database.
NB: there must be no database with the name you provide. Otherwise exception will be thrown.
member.param: The connection string. You may want to connect to master database for this operation.
Name of a new database you are creating
Full path to the bacpac file

member.name: M:Cake.SqlServer.DacAliases.ExtractDacpacFile(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,System.String,System.String,Cake.SqlServer.ExtractDacpacSettings)
member.summary: Extracts a dacpac file to a database package.
member.param: Name of the database you'd like to extract a package from
Custom setting for the extract operation.

member.name: M:Cake.SqlServer.DacAliases.PublishDacpacFile(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,System.String,System.String,Cake.Core.IO.FilePath,Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings)
member.summary: Publish a dacpac file to a database.
member.param: The connection string. You may want to connect to master database for this operation.
Full path to the dacpac file.

member.name: T:Cake.SqlServer.ExtractDacpacSettings
member.summary: Settings for extract dacpac from database

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.ExtractDacpacSettings.Name
member.summary: String identifier for the DAC application.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.ExtractDacpacSettings.Version
member.summary: Version of the DAC application.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.ExtractDacpacSettings.Description
member.summary: Optional string summary of the DAC application.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.ExtractDacpacSettings.OutputFile
member.summary: Path to the package file to be created.

summary.para: Optional enumerable used to retrieve enumerator over set of tables for which reference data should be stored. For each in the enumeration the first item specifies the schema of the table, and the second specifies the base identifier of the table.
If the value for this parameter is a null reference, no reference data will be stored.

member.name: M:Cake.SqlServer.ExtractDacpacSettings.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: String identifier for the DAC application.
member.param: String identifier for the DAC application.

member.name: M:Cake.SqlServer.ExtractDacpacSettings.WithTable(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Include table in the set of tables for which reference data should be stored.
member.returns: The same settings instance to chain config

member.name: T:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings
member.summary: Settings for extract dacpac from database

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.GenerateDeploymentScript
member.summary: Sets whether Deployment Script(s) should be generated during deploy. If true, a script to update the database will be generated, and a script to update Master may also be generated if the target is an Azure SQL DB and this database has not yet been created.
member.value: Defaults to true

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.GenerateDeploymentReport
member.summary: Sets whether a Deployment Report should be generated during deploy. This report is a high-level summary of actions being performed during deployment.
member.value: Defaults to false

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.DatabaseScriptPath
member.summary: Optional path to write the DB-level deployment script, if is true. This script contains all operations that must be done against the database during deployment.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.MasterDbScriptPath
member.summary: Optional path to write the master database-level deployment script, if is true. This script is only created if Azure SQL DB is the target as USE statements are not supported on that platform. It contains all operations that must be done against the master database, for instance Create Database statements

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.AdditionalDeploymentContributors
member.summary: Specifies additional deployment contributors which should run - in addition to those specified in the dacpac.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.AdditionalDeploymentContributorArguments
member.summary: Specifies additional deployment contributor arguments in addition to those already listed in the dacpac.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.AllowDropBlockingAssemblies
member.summary: Get or set boolean that specifies whether CLR deployment will cause blocking assemblies to be dropped.
member.value: True to drop blocking assemblies during CLR deployment; otherwise, false. Default is false.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.AllowIncompatiblePlatform
member.summary: Get or set boolean that specifies whether deployment will block due to platform compatibility.
member.value: True to block deployment to incompatible platforms; otherwise, false. Default is false.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.BackupDatabaseBeforeChanges
member.summary: Get or set boolean that specifies whether a database backup will be performed before proceeding with the actual deployment actions.
member.value: True to perform a database backup prior to deployment; otherwise, false. Default is false.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.BlockOnPossibleDataLoss
member.summary: Get or set boolean that specifies whether deployment should stop if the operation could cause data loss.
member.value: True to stop deployment if possible data loss if detected; otherwise, false. Default is true.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.BlockWhenDriftDetected
member.summary: Get or set boolean that specifies whether the system will check for differences between the present state of the database and the registered state of the database and block deployment if changes are detected. Even if this option is set to true, drift detection will only occur on a database if it was previously deployed with the option enabled.
member.value: True to error is drift is detected; otherwise, false. Default is true.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.CommandTimeout
member.summary: Specifies the command timeout in seconds when executing queries against SQLServer.
member.value: The command timeout in seconds. Default is 60

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.CommentOutSetVarDeclarations
member.summary: Get or set boolean that specifies whether the declaration of SQLCMD variables are commented out in the script header.
member.value: True to comment out these declarations; otherwise, false. Default is false.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.CompareUsingTargetCollation
member.summary: Get or set boolean that specifies whether the target collation will be used for identifier comparison.
member.value: False to use the source collation; otherwise, true to use the target collation. Default is false.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.CreateNewDatabase
member.summary: Get or set boolean that specifies whether the existing database will be dropped and a new database created before proceeding with the actual deployment actions. Acquires single-user mode before dropping the existing database.
member.value: True to drop and re-create the database; otherwise, false. Default is false.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.DeployDatabaseInSingleUserMode
member.summary: Get or set boolean that specifies whether the system will acquire single-user mode on the target database during the duration of the deployment operation.
member.value: True to acquire single-user mode during deployment; otherwise, false. Default is false.
member.remarks: The database will be returned to multi-user mode after all changes are applied. Database may remain in single-user mode if an error occurs during execution.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.DisableAndReenableDdlTriggers
member.summary: Get or set boolean that specifies if all DDL triggers will be disabled for the duration of the deployment operation and then re-enabled after all changes are applied.
member.value: True to disable DDL triggers during deployment; otherwise, false. Default is true.
member.remarks: Triggers may remain disabled if an error occurs during execution.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.DoNotAlterChangeDataCaptureObjects
member.summary: Get or set boolean that specifies whether items configured for Change Data Capture (CDC) should be altered during deployment.
member.value: True to not alter objects configured for CDC; otherwise, false. Default is true.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.DoNotAlterReplicatedObjects
member.summary: Get or set boolean that specifies whether items configured for Replication should be altered during deployment.
member.value: True to not alter objects configured for Replication; otherwise, false. Default is true.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.DropConstraintsNotInSource
member.summary: Get or set boolean that specifies whether to drop all constraints that do not exist in the source model.
member.value: True to drop constraints not in the source model; otherwise, false. Default is true.
member.remarks: This applies to check, default, foreign key, primary key, and unique constraints.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.DropDmlTriggersNotInSource
member.summary: Get or set boolean that specifies whether to drop all DML triggers that do not exist in the source model.
member.value: True to drop DML triggers not in the source model; otherwise, false. Default is true.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.DropExtendedPropertiesNotInSource
member.summary: Get or set boolean that specifies whether to drop all extended properties that do not exist in the source model.
member.value: True to drop extended properties not in the source model; otherwise, false. Default is true.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.DropIndexesNotInSource
member.summary: Get or set boolean that specifies whether to drop all indexes that do not exist in the source model.
member.value: True to drop indexes not in the source model; otherwise, false. Default is true.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.DropObjectsNotInSource
member.summary: Get or set boolean that specifies whether objects that exist in the target but not source should be dropped during deployment.
member.value: True if objects that exist in the target but not source should be dropped; otherwise false. Default is false.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.DropPermissionsNotInSource
member.summary: Get or set boolean that specifies whether to drop all permissions that do not exist in the source model.
member.value: True to drop permissions not in the source model; otherwise, false. Default is false.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.DropRoleMembersNotInSource
member.summary: Get or set boolean that specifies whether to drop all role memberships that do not exist in the source model.
member.value: True to drop role memberships not in the source model; otherwise, false. Default is false.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.DropStatisticsNotInSource
member.summary: Get or set boolean that specifies whether to drop all role memberships that do not exist in the source model.
member.value: True to drop role memberships not in the source model; otherwise, false. Default is false.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.GenerateSmartDefaults
member.summary: Get or set boolean that specifies whether default values should be generated to populate NULL columns that are constrained to NOT NULL values.
member.value: True if default values should be generated; otherwise false. Default is false.
member.remarks: This is useful when needing to add a new NOT NULL column to an existing table with data.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.IgnoreAnsiNulls
member.summary: Get or set boolean that specifies whether to exclude the ANSI_NULL option from consideration when comparing the source and target model.
member.value: True to ignore differences in the ANSI_NULL option; otherwise, false. Default is false.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.IgnoreAuthorizer
member.summary: Get or set boolean that specifies whether to exclude the AUTHORIZATION option from consideration when comparing the source and target model.
member.value: True to ignore differences in the AUTHORIZATION option; otherwise, false. Default is false.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.IgnoreColumnCollation
member.summary: Get or set boolean that specifies whether to exclude the collation specifier from consideration when comparing the source and target model.
member.value: True to ignore differences in the collation specifier; otherwise, false. Default is false.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.IgnoreComments
member.summary: Get or set boolean that specifies whether to exclude comments from consideration when comparing the source and target model.
member.value: True to ignore differences in comments; otherwise, false. Default is false.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.IgnoreCryptographicProviderFilePath
member.summary: Get or set boolean that specifies whether to exclude the file specification of a cryptographic provider from consideration when comparing the source and target model.
member.value: True to ignore differences in a cryptographic provider's file specification; otherwise, false. Default is true.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.IgnoreDdlTriggerOrder
member.summary: Get or set boolean that specifies whether to exclude DDL trigger order from consideration when comparing the source and target model.
member.value: True to ignore differences in DDL trigger order; otherwise, false. Default is false.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.IgnoreDdlTriggerState
member.summary: Get or set boolean that specifies whether to exclude DDL trigger state from consideration when comparing the source and target model.
member.value: True to ignore differences in DDL trigger state; otherwise, false. Default is false.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.IgnoreDefaultSchema
member.summary: Get or set boolean that specifies whether to exclude the DEFAULT_SCHEMA option from consideration when comparing the source and target model.
member.value: True to ignore differences in the DEFAULT_SCHEMA options; otherwise, false. Default is false.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.IgnoreDmlTriggerOrder
member.summary: Get or set boolean that specifies whether to exclude DML trigger order from consideration when comparing the source and target model.
member.value: True to ignore differences in DDL trigger order; otherwise, false. Default is false.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.IgnoreDmlTriggerState
member.summary: Get or set boolean that specifies whether to exclude DML trigger state from consideration when comparing the source and target model.
member.value: True to ignore differences in DML trigger state; otherwise, false. Default is false.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.IgnoreExtendedProperties
member.summary: Get or set boolean that specifies whether to exclude all extended properties from consideration when comparing the source and target model.
member.value: True to ignore differences in extended properties; otherwise, false. Default is false.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.IgnoreFileAndLogFilePath
member.summary: Get or set boolean that specifies whether to exclude the FILENAME option of FILE objects from consideration when comparing the source and target model.
member.value: True to ignore differences in the FILENAME option of FILE objects; otherwise, false. Default is true.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.IgnoreFilegroupPlacement
member.summary: Get or set boolean that specifies whether to exclude the filegroup specifier from consideration when comparing the source and target model.
member.value: True to ignore differences in the filegroup specifier; otherwise, false. Default is true.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.IgnoreFileSize
member.summary: Get or set boolean that specifies whether to exclude the SIZE option of FILE objects from consideration when comparing the source and target model.
member.value: True to ignore differences in the SIZE option of FILE objects; otherwise, false. Default is true.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.IgnoreFillFactor
member.summary: Get or set boolean that specifies whether to exclude the FILLFACTOR option from consideration when comparing the source and target model.
member.value: True to ignore differences in the FILLFACTOR option; otherwise, false. Default is true.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.IgnoreFullTextCatalogFilePath
member.summary: Get or set boolean that specifies whether to exclude the path specification of FULLTEXT CATALOG objects from consideration when comparing the source and target model.
member.value: True to ignore differences in the path specification of FULLTEXT CATALOG objects; otherwise, false. Default is true.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.IgnoreIdentitySeed
member.summary: Get or set boolean that specifies whether to exclude the seed value of IDENTITY columns from consideration when comparing the source and target model.
member.value: True to ignore differences in the seed value of IDENTITY columns; otherwise, false. Default is false.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.IgnoreIncrement
member.summary: Get or set boolean that specifies whether to exclude the increment value of IDENTITY columns from consideration when comparing the source and target model.
member.value: True to ignore differences in the increment value of IDENTITY columns; otherwise, false. Default is false.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.IgnoreIndexOptions
member.summary: Get or set boolean that specifies whether to exclude differences in index options from consideration when comparing the source and target model.
member.value: True to ignore differences in index options; otherwise, false. Default is false.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.IgnoreIndexPadding
member.summary: Get or set boolean that specifies whether to exclude the PAD_INDEX option from consideration when comparing the source and target model.
member.value: True to ignore differences in the PAD_INDEX option; otherwise, false. Default is true.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.IgnoreKeywordCasing
member.summary: Get or set boolean that specifies whether to exclude difference in the casing of keywords from consideration when comparing the source and target model.
member.value: True to ignore differences in the casing of keywords; otherwise, false. Default is true.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.IgnoreLockHintsOnIndexes
member.summary: Get or set boolean that specifies whether to exclude the ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS and ALLOW_PAGE_LOGKS options from consideration when comparing the source and target model.
member.value: True to ignore the ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS and ALLOW_PAGE_LOGKS options; otherwise, false. Default is false.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.IgnoreLoginSids
member.summary: Get or set boolean that specifies whether to exclude the SID option of the LOGIN object from consideration when comparing the source and target model.
member.value: True to ignore the SID option of the LOGIN object; otherwise, false. Default is true.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.IgnoreNotForReplication
member.summary: Get or set boolean that specifies whether to exclude the NOT FOR REPLICATION option from consideration when comparing the source and target model.
member.value: True to ignore the NOT FOR REPLICATION option; otherwise, false. Default is false.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.IgnoreObjectPlacementOnPartitionScheme
member.summary: Get or set boolean that specifies whether to exclude the partition scheme object from consideration when comparing the source and target model for the following objects: Table, Index, Unique Key, Primary Key, and Queue.
member.value: True to ignore partition schemes; otherwise, false. Default is true.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.IgnorePartitionSchemes
member.summary: Get or set boolean that specifies whether to exclude the parameter type and boundary VALUES of a PARTITION FUNCTION from consideration when comparing the source and target model. Also excludes FILEGROUP and partition function of a PARTITION SCHEMA from consideration when comparing the source and target model.
member.value: True to ignore aspects of partition functions and schemes; otherwise, false. Default is false.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.IgnorePermissions
member.summary: Get or set boolean that specifies whether to exclude all permission statements from consideration when comparing the source and target model.
member.value: True to ignore all permission statements; otherwise, false. Default is false.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.IgnoreQuotedIdentifiers
member.summary: Get or set boolean that specifies whether to exclude the QUOTED_IDENTIFIER option from consideration when comparing the source and target model.
member.value: True to ignore the QUOTED_IDENTIFIER option; otherwise, false. Default is false.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.IgnoreRoleMembership
member.summary: Get or set boolean that specifies whether to exclude all ROLE MEMBERSHIP objects from consideration when comparing the source and target model.
member.value: True to ignore ROLE MEMBERSHIP objects; otherwise, false. Default is false.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.IgnoreRouteLifetime
member.summary: Get or set boolean that specifies whether to exclude the LIFETIME option of ROUTE objects from consideration when comparing the source and target model.
member.value: True to ignore the LIFETIME option of ROUTE objects; otherwise, false. Default is true.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.IgnoreSemicolonBetweenStatements
member.summary: Get or set boolean that specifies whether to exclude the existence or absence of semi-colons from consideration when comparing the source and target model.
member.value: True to ignore semi-colons; otherwise, false. Default is true.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.IgnoreTableOptions
member.summary: Get or set boolean that specifies whether the options on the target table are updated to match the source table.
member.value: True to ignore difference in table options and not update the target table; otherwise, false. Default is false.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.IgnoreUserSettingsObjects
member.summary: Get or set boolean that specifies whether to exclude user settings from consideration when comparing the source and target model.
member.value: True to ignore differences in user settings; otherwise, false. Default is false.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.IgnoreWhitespace
member.summary: Get or set boolean that specifies whether to exclude whitespace from consideration when comparing the source and target model.
member.value: True to ignore differences whitespace; otherwise, false. Default is true.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.IgnoreWithNocheckOnCheckConstraints
member.summary: Get or set boolean that specifies whether to exclude the CHECK|NO CHECK option of a CHECK constraint object from consideration when comparing the source and target model.
member.value: True to ignore the CHECK|NO CHECK option of a CHECK constraint object; otherwise, false. Default is false.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.IgnoreWithNocheckOnForeignKeys
member.summary: Get or set boolean that specifies whether to exclude the CHECK|NO CHECK option of a FOREIGN KEY constraint object from consideration when comparing the source and target model.
member.value: True to ignore the CHECK|NO CHECK option of a FOREIGN KEY constraint object; otherwise, false. Default is false.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.AllowUnsafeRowLevelSecurityDataMovement
member.summary: Get or set boolean that specifies whether to ignore blocking data motion on RLS enabled tables
member.value: True to ignore block on data motion when Row level security is enabled on a table Default is false i.e. data motion is blocked with RLS by default.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.IncludeCompositeObjects
member.summary: Get or set boolean that specifies whether to include referenced, external elements that also compose the source model and then update the target database in a single deployment operation.
member.value: True to include composite objects; otherwise, false. Default is false.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.IncludeTransactionalScripts
member.summary: Get or set boolean that specifies whether to use transations during the deployment operation and commit the transaction after all changes are successfully applied.
member.value: True to use transactions during deployment; otherwise, false. Default is false.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.NoAlterStatementsToChangeClrTypes
member.summary: Get or set boolean that specifies whether to force a change to CLR assemblies by dropping and recreating them.
member.value: True if CLR assemblies should be dropped; otherwise false to allow ALTER statements to change CLR assemblies. Default is false.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.PopulateFilesOnFileGroups
member.summary: Get or set boolean that specifies whether files are supplied for filegroups defined in the deployment source.
member.value: True to specify files for filegroups; otherwise false. Default is true.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.RegisterDataTierApplication
member.summary: Get or set boolean that specifies whether the database will be registered as a Data-Tier Application. If the target database is already a registered Data-Tier Application, then the registration will be updated.
member.value: True to register the database as a Data-Tier Application; otherwise, false. Default is false.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.RunDeploymentPlanExecutors
member.summary: Specifies whether DeploymentPlanExecutor contributors should be run when other operations are executed. Default is false.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.ScriptDatabaseCollation
member.summary: Get or set boolean that specifies whether the target database should be altered to match the source model's collation.
member.value: True to alter the target database's collation; otherwise, false. Default is false.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.ScriptDatabaseCompatibility
member.summary: Get or set boolean that specifies whether the target database should be altered to match the source model's compatibility level.
member.value: True to alter the target database's compatibility level; otherwise, false. Default is false.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.ScriptDatabaseOptions
member.summary: Get or set boolean that specifies whether the database options in the target database should be updated to match the source model.
member.value: True to alter the target database's options; otherwise, false. Default is true.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.ScriptDeployStateChecks
member.summary: Get or set boolean that specifies whether the target database should be checked to ensure that it exists, is online and can be updated.
member.value: True to perform state checks on the target database; otherwise, false. Default is false.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.ScriptFileSize
member.summary: Get or set boolean that specifies whether a file size is specified when adding files to file groups.
member.value: True to specify a file size when adding files to file groups; otherwise, false. Default is false.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.ScriptNewConstraintValidation
member.summary: Get or set boolean that specifies whether constraints are validated after all changes are applied.
member.value: True to validate check constraints; otherwise, false. Default is true.
member.remarks: Constraints are always added with NOCHECK option; as a result their validation is skipped during creation.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.ScriptRefreshModule
member.summary: Get or set boolean that specifies whether referencing procedures are refreshed when referenced objects are updated.
member.value: True to refresh referencing procedures; otherwise false. Default is true.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.TreatVerificationErrorsAsWarnings
member.summary: Get or set boolean that specifies whether to treat errors that occur during publish verification as warnings. The check is performed against the generated deployment plan before the plan is executed against the target database. Plan verification detects problems, such as the loss of target-only objects (for example, indexes), that must be dropped to make a change. Verification also detects situations where dependencies (such as tables or views) exist because of a reference to a composite project, but do not exist in the target database. You might choose to treat verification errors as warnings to get a complete list of issues instead of allowing the publish action to stop when the first error occurs.
member.value: True to treat errors as warnings; otherwise, false. Default is false.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.UnmodifiableObjectWarnings
member.summary: Get or set boolean that specifies whether warnings should be generated when differences are found in objects that cannot be modified, for example, if the file size or file paths were different for a file.
member.value: True to generate warnings; otherwise, false. Default is true.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.VerifyCollationCompatibility
member.summary: Get or set boolean that specifies whether deployment will verify that the collation specified in the source model is compatible with the collation specified in the target model.
member.value: True to continue if errors are generated during plan verification; otherwise, false. Default is true.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.VerifyDeployment
member.summary: Get or set boolean that specifies whether the plan verification phase is executed or not.
member.value: True to perform plan verification; otherwise, false to skip it. Default is true.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.SqlCommandVariableValues
member.summary: Get dictionary of SQL command variable values, keyed by variable name.
member.remarks: Valid values must be provided for every variable before deployment, or failures may occur during deployment.

member.name: M:Cake.SqlServer.PublishDacpacSettings.#ctor
member.summary: Configures options for what will be reported when performing certain operations from , in particular whether a DeployReport and/or DeployScript will be generated

member.name: T:Cake.SqlServer.RestoreSqlBackupSettings
member.summary: Settings for restoring database from a backup file

member.name: M:Cake.SqlServer.RestoreSqlBackupSettings.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor for settings object. Sets SwitchToSingleUserMode to true.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.RestoreSqlBackupSettings.NewDatabaseName
member.summary: Gets or sets the new name of the database. Name of the database where to restore. If this is not specified, database name is taken from the backup file
member.value: The new name of the database.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.RestoreSqlBackupSettings.NewStorageFolder
member.summary: Gets or sets the new storage folder. Path where data and log files should be stored.If this is not specified, server defaults will be used
member.value: The new storage folder.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.RestoreSqlBackupSettings.WithReplace
member.summary: Sets the flag to execute restore command `WITH REPLACE` suffix. Allows you to write over an existing database when doing a restore without first backing up the tail of the transaction log. The WITH REPLACE basically tells SQL Server to just throw out any active contents in the transaction log and move forward with the restore.

member.name: P:Cake.SqlServer.RestoreSqlBackupSettings.SwitchToSingleUserMode
member.summary: Before restoring backup, database will be switched to a single user mode. Default operation is to go into single user mode. However in some situation this might not work. Use this switch to bypass single user mode and restore the DB as it is

member.name: M:Cake.SqlServer.Sql.EscapeName(System.String)
member.summary: Performance-optimized SQL-safe name.

member.name: M:Cake.SqlServer.LocalDbAliases.LocalDbCreateInstance(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,System.String,Cake.SqlServer.LocalDbVersion)
member.summary: Creates a server instance and starts the server.
member.param: Name of the instance to create
Version number of LocalDB to use V11 or V12. The specified version must be installed on the computer. If not specified, the version number defaults to the version of the SqlLocalDB utility

member.name: M:Cake.SqlServer.LocalDbAliases.LocalDbCreateInstance(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a server instance and starts the server. The version number defaults to the version of the SqlLocalDB utility
member.param: Name of the instance to create

member.name: M:Cake.SqlServer.LocalDbAliases.LocalDbDeleteInstance(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,System.String)
member.summary: Deletes the LocalDB instance

member.name: M:Cake.SqlServer.LocalDbAliases.LocalDbStartInstance(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,System.String)
member.summary: Starts the LocalDB instance. Instance must exist before you can start it.
member.param: Name of the instance to start

member.name: M:Cake.SqlServer.LocalDbAliases.LocalDbStopInstance(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,System.String)
member.summary: Stops the LocalDB instance.
member.param: Name of the instance to stop

member.name: T:Cake.SqlServer.LocalDbVersion
member.summary: Version of LocalDB

member.name: F:Cake.SqlServer.LocalDbVersion.V11
member.summary: Represents v11 of LocalDB

member.name: F:Cake.SqlServer.LocalDbVersion.V12
member.summary: Represents v12 of LocalDB

member.name: F:Cake.SqlServer.LocalDbVersion.V13
member.summary: Represents v13 of LocalDB

summary.para: Contains functionality to deal with SQL Server: DropDatabase, CreateDatabase, execute SQL, execute SQL from files, etc. Provides functionality to manage LocalDb instances: Create, Start, Stop, Delete instances;

In order to use the commands for this addin, include the following in your build.cake file to download and reference from NuGet.org:
#addin "nuget:?package=Cake.SqlServer"

member.name: M:Cake.SqlServer.SqlServerAliases.DatabaseExists(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Test if the database exists
member.param: The connection string. For this operation, it is recommended to connect to the master database (default). If there are changing parameters, is recommended to escape input.

member.name: M:Cake.SqlServer.SqlServerAliases.DropDatabase(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Drops database. Before dropping the DB, database is set to be offline, then online again. This is to be sure that there are no live connections, otherwise the script will fail. Also if the database does not exist - it will not do anything.
member.param: The connection string. For this operation, it is recommended to connect to the master database (default). If there are changing parameters, is recommended to escape input.

member.name: M:Cake.SqlServer.SqlServerAliases.CreateDatabase(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates an empty database. If database with this name already exists, throws a SqlException. if you would like to check if database already exists.
member.param: The connection string. For this operation, it is recommended to connect to the master database (default). If there are changing parameters, is recommended to escape input.

member.name: M:Cake.SqlServer.SqlServerAliases.CreateDatabase(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,System.String,System.String,Cake.SqlServer.CreateDatabaseSettings)
member.summary: Creates an empty database. If database with this name already exists, throws a SqlException. Allows to specify primary and log files location.
member.param: The connection string. For this operation, it is recommended to connect to the master database (default). If there are changing parameters, is recommended to escape input.

member.name: M:Cake.SqlServer.SqlServerAliases.CreateDatabaseIfNotExists(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates an empty database if another database with the same does not already exist.
member.param: The connection string. For this operation, it is recommended to connect to the master database (default). If there are changing parameters, is recommended to escape input.

member.name: M:Cake.SqlServer.SqlServerAliases.CreateDatabaseIfNotExists(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,System.String,System.String,Cake.SqlServer.CreateDatabaseSettings)
member.summary: Creates an empty database if another database with the same does not already exist.
member.param: The connection string. For this operation, it is recommended to connect to the master database (default). If there are changing parameters, is recommended to escape input.

member.name: M:Cake.SqlServer.SqlServerAliases.DropAndCreateDatabase(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: First drops, then recreates the database
member.param: The connection string. For this operation, it is recommended to connect to the master database (default). If there are changing parameters, is recommended to escape input.
Database to be dropped and re-created

member.name: M:Cake.SqlServer.SqlServerAliases.DropAndCreateDatabase(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,System.String,System.String,Cake.SqlServer.CreateDatabaseSettings)
member.summary: First drops, then recreates the database
member.param: The connection string. For this operation, it is recommended to connect to the master database (default). If there are changing parameters, is recommended to escape input.
Database to be dropped and re-created

member.summary: Execute any SQL command.
member.param: The connection string. You may want to specify Initial Catalog. If there are changing parameters, is recommended to escape input.

member.summary: Execute any SQL command.
member.param: The connection to use. The connection must be open. See .

member.summary: Reads SQL commands from a file and executes them.

Path to a file with SQL commands.

member.summary: Reads SQL commands from a file and executes them.
member.param: The connection to use. The connection must be open. See .
Path to a file with SQL commands.

member.summary: Sets the CommandTimeout property for all SqlCommands used internally
member.param: The time in seconds to wait for the command to execute. Used to set CommandTimeout property to when creating
